Hello, 
     I am so sorry that you were not able to find what you were looking for. I would never call anyone unneeded and in fact I was looking forward to interacting with your characters in upcoming scenes. Unfortunately I had already planned on doing what I did to Myrmidon before you had arrived, and I regret that had no other active characters in the area to keep anything going with you. :(

Perhaps this is a lesson to us all. :(

Preston



----- Original Message ----
Wrom: MKHJYFMYXOEAIJJPHSCRTNHGSWZIDREXCAXZO
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, September 14, 2008 1:47:26 PM
Subject: Taking my leave


Hi all,

As much as I had hoped that this story would work out, it's become
pretty clear to me that it's not.  At least not for me.  Between not
knowing what's going and not being responded to, I feel like an
unneeded fish out of water - or maybe an unneeded BW fan in a
predominantly Transformers RP.  Not your guys' fault that I don't know
my Transformers, nor is it your fault that I had other expectations. 
However, as a suggestion I wouldn't make it a habit of letting posts
go blatantly ignored for so long, especially when it comes to
newcomers who don't know what the heck they're doing ;)

Feel free to write out Shard, or kill him off.  I'll just delete my
Maul post since it went unanswered and won't be missed. 

I'd like to thank Cyclonus for his help; I wouldn't have even made it
this far without him, and I enjoyed the interaction with Myrmidon
while it lasted.  :)  Good luck to you all!
